Title: Openfire: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Openfire, the worst of
    which could lead to privilege escalation.

Background.Text: Openfire (formerly Wildfire) is a cross-platform real-time collaboration server based on the XMPP (Jabber) protocol.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Openfire. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could bypass the CSRF protection mechanism, conduct Cross-Site Scripting attacks, or an authenticated remote attacker could gain privileges while accessing Openfireâ€™s web interface.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Openfire users should upgrade to the latest version:
